attributes.action: Petition to remove Jeremy Corbyn as Labour leader
attributes.additional_details:
The press has already proven that many people joined just to vote for Jeremy Corbyn knowing that when it came down to it, no one would vote for a labour party with him as leader.

The joke is now over, the man is a danger to Great Britain. He has snubbed the queen, the privy council and in doing so has snubbed the traditional values that MPs are supposed to abide by.

This man needs to be removed from office before he causes more damage to the UK people and its economy.
attributes.background: Jeremy Corbyn was elected as labour leader by an overwhelming majority. 85% of these votes were from members of the public, some of which, I know joined the labour party specifically to vote for Jeremy Corbyn to bring down the labour party and ensure they were not re-elected in the future.

rejection.details: The leader of the Labour party is chosen by the party itself, not by the UK Government or Parliament.
